alert.note: Alert for Natchitoches; Sabine (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 9:30PM CDT until April 15 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Natchitoches Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Southeastern Sabine Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Southeastern San Augustine County in eastern Texas... Southern Sabine County in eastern Texas... * Until 1000 PM CDT. * At 930 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southeast of Hemphill, or 12 miles northwest of Toledo Bend Dam, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hemphill, Pineland, Browndell, Florien, Fisher, Kisatchie, Fairmount, Mount Carmel, McElroy, Negreet, Yellowpine, Columbus and Gorum. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
